website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for those wanting a quality, under-desk keyboard tray without paying a premium price.
pros: Adjusts in height and tilting angle
Tray can swivel left or right
Customers find the product highly comfortable to use
cons: Has trouble sliding from out under the desk
Can be too narrow for some keyboards

customer_reviews.title: A beast
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, almost too heavy duty..easy to assemble and install, very stable...careful with included screws, almost one inch long, you may need to get shorter screws so as not to penetrate the surface...
customer_reviews.author: Philip zangara

customer_reviews.title: Solid but difficult to slide
customer_reviews.text: This under desk keyboard tray is solid and strong. The metal supports are heavy gauge metal. The keyboard tray itself is adjustable and solid. The big problem is that the slider is not equipped with ball bearing tracks. This makes the tray very difficult to slide. The tray does not slide smoothly under the desk, and requires 2 hands and a strong grip to get it to move. My prior tray could be pushed with one finger. Also the actual keyboard platform seems to be generic for multiple differs sliders, and has screw holes on top that are not used, resulting in an unsightly appearance. However overall the unit is functional.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki V

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Things I like: It's adjustable to different heights -4 star Sturdy- 4 star Room for keyboard and mouse 4 star Installation wasn't difficult 4 star Issues: It's much too difficult to pull out. I added grease per the instructions but it takes quite a bit of effort to pull the keyboard out...1 star The adjusting knob is way too big and bulky and protrudes out just enough that my knee bangs up against it. It's very annoying and is why I will only use this as a place to store my keyboard. I won't type with it. Makes it difficult to scoot my legs under my desk. 0 stars
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Mason Clark

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard tray is warped!
customer_reviews.text: Not good. I installed this and now my keyboard wobbles all over because the MDF is curved downward on both sides... maybe high heat during transit did this. Either way, it sucks and should really be looked into by the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Dromodor

customer_reviews.title: Great product but poor directions.
customer_reviews.text: Directions that come with the unit are terrible and you need to know basic carpenter skills to install the unit. On the other hand, the unit itself is great. It is large enough to fit both keyboard and mouse. It adjusts to any angle, up, down and side-to-side. The under mounting metal brackets are heavy and well made with enough screws to secure it into placed.
customer_reviews.author: REB

customer_reviews.title: You will constantly bang your knee on the over-sized adjustment knob
customer_reviews.text: The adjustment knob and brackets on the bottom of the tray are too large/bulky and prevent you front getting the tray in a comfortable position. The whole point of the tray is to lower the keyboard to an appropriate height but because of the bulk underneath you can't comfortably get your legs under it. Like other reviewers I'm frequently banging my knee on the knob and the metal bracket is resting on my leg. I can't raise it any higher because it will then defeat the purpose. It has cleared space on my desk but in terms of comfort and ergonomics, it is flawed.
customer_reviews.author: sodiumkpump

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and decent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot understand why quality underdesk platforms need to be extremely expensive when sturdy. This one is about $70-80 and do the function pretty well. I have read some negative comments about stability. To be honest, I find this platform very stable if well installed, which is basically tight few screws under your desk. Very straightforward. I have a big platform at work which I expect that cost quite a bit $, in terms of stability they both are very similar but this one is not super ergonomic. Not very smooth to put the platform out and under the desk, but still possible if pushing it up a little. Comparing the price with other platforms, this one functions very great!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy keyboard drawer - up/down and tilt adjustments are good - sliding in and out not as good
customer_reviews.text: This thing is built very solidly - plenty of metal and wood and feels very sturdy. Lots of room for a full-size keyboard and mouse. The rest for your wrists is a little too big for me, so I had to raise my keyboard by putting a board underneath it - I could probably also take the wrist rest off. Installation was pretty easy. The only drawback was the sliding mechanism. Definitely not as smooth as others I have seen that use roller bearings. So if you slide the drawer in and out a lot - then you might want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Hoekstra

customer_reviews.title: Very strong but some minor issues
customer_reviews.text: It is a large comfortable and very adjustable tray. It is superior quality to the Fellows I had for over 22 years (but shout out to anything that last over 20 years!). The installation straightforward and fairly simple. There were only 12 screws supplied as mentioned in the directions but 14 are required. My main complaint is that there is a really horrible off gassing coming from the wrist rest. Fortunately it can be removed. Hopefully a few days of fresh air with fix this. Make certain to air the tray or just wrist rest out before you install it as it can quickly overpower and entire room.
customer_reviews.author: Vestris

customer_reviews.title: Relatively quick install, but...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is a good piece of hardware. It took me about 40 minutes to install. Probably would take another person 15 minutes. It's nicely wide and the mechanism works well. The one complaint I have is that it emits a kind of chemical smell... almost like magic marker, one of those really heavy duty ones that gives you a little head rush if you smell it. This isn't as strong as that, but I keep getting this pungent odor in my nose. Hope that goes away quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Viola

customer_reviews.title: I love it.  I wish I bought this years ago.  Screws were too long for my desk.
customer_reviews.text: Similar experience as the other reviewers. Overall great product. Very sturdy and high quality. I wasn't sure I'd like the grey but it is nice. Instructions could have been a little better, I screwed the whole plate on before realizing that I had to use the same screw for the bumpers on the front and back. Also, the screws were too long (almost 1 inch but I think they were in mm) and I had to go get 5/8 in screws from the hardware store and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O.

customer_reviews.title: solid and well made--- confusing drawing
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install but sheet that came with it is vague. You receive two track guards but the drawing only shows one.. If you do use both then they are two screws short in the package. No idea what the bumper is. Board shows eight mounting screws but the board only has four. Says mount 20mm from edge of worksurface but they do not show which way to measure the 20mm I assumed back from the edge not overlapping it once in place it is good and solid and does not wobble
customer_reviews.author: David Ward

customer_reviews.title: This. Is. Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best tray I've ever experienced, and for a good price. I sadly moved to a standing desk that didn't have enough clearance to install the tray, so I sold my old desk with the Vivo. I regretted it, so I bought another one, this time with Vivo's extra spacer brackets which allowed me to install it onto an otherwise incompatible desk. Seriously, it's really really good. The stability, flexibility, and size. Note that its track is a little tough.
customer_reviews.author: petersrin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy keyboard tray. Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical when purchasing this under desk tray as some reviews complained about the height adjustment knob and it's difficult to slide. I didn't find these issues on mine. It was easy to install and feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: S. W. Si

customer_reviews.title: We attached this to my desk and I love it! It works really well
customer_reviews.text: We attached this to my desk and I love it! It works really well. You can pull it right out, adjust it to your height via the tray moving up, down, correct slant or to the right or left. When finished typing you can just loosen the knob when you are done and slide it right back underneath the desk and out of the way. It is sturdy and I would buy it again! I really appreciate whoever it was that put the video on reviews that show how exactly to attach it to your desk. That was really helpful as my husband to attach a board underneath mine first too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super hard to open & close!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super hard to open & close!! I kind of have to use a lot of muscle and I feel like I’m going to break it when I open/close this. It definitely isn’t smooth!!! This is a huge drawback and if it wasn’t already installed I’d return it. Otherwise this is an ok product....
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: This product was pretty easy to install considering you are on your back ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was pretty easy to install considering you are on your back under the desk. The slide mechanism is stiff, but I think this is good, and will loosen up over time. Function wise it works very well, and I would recommend this product. It was definitely worth the extra money compared to the other options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your shoulders and wrists will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I had bought one of the less expensive ones that you don’t need to permanently attach to you desk and that was a mistake and waste of money. It was unstable and made typing difficult. This is very sturdy and adjusts to whatever angle is most comfortable. My wrists and shoulders are thanking me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable keytray that stays out of the Way/
customer_reviews.text: Working very well and a simple installation once you looked at it and not the instructions. With all that comes out of China you would think they would get it!! You need clear concise instructions. If I had followed the instructions I would be frustrated. Hire an American to write your manuals.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer 109

customer_reviews.title: Good Keyboard Tray
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good under the desk adjustable shelf. It just comes with screws for attaching to the desk. With my set up I needed to get some bolts and nuts to attach to a under the desk pull out drawer. It has helped with my neck and should issues I have been having for not having the keyboard in the right location. Would recommend if someone is looking for a solid pull out for their computer keyboard, and mouse. I do put my own mouse pad down to give me a little extra space for my mouse, and not hit the lip of the shelf..
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good basic articulating tray at a good basic price. It took about an hour to install, with most of that time on my back under my desk. I was at first disappointed when I thought it wouldn't swing left and right, but found it is simply stiff in that axis. All in all a reasonable value.
customer_reviews.author: Restoration Hobbyist

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was easy to install. It pretty much comes assembled with a few piece. The key board Swivels and adjust to almost any position desired. It is a little stiff to slide in and out as one reviewer described but this is needed otherwise it would be moving while you are using it. Who wants that? Highly recommend and it's about 35% less cost than competitors. Thx.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Love this product and the price
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to mount it may be a half an inch short for my ergonomic large keyboard but the way I have set up it works fine. I love all the different till features and angles you can move this the only thing that could make it better is it would have a separate mouse pad area you could move on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but heavy for certain types of wood
customer_reviews.text: The product is OK and looks sturdy, but be aware that it's pretty heavy. Wood screws are provided to hold it in place underneath the desk, however if you have a desk made from plywood or other weaker types, then it won't be able to hold the weight and most likely it will fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Salman M

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this. It's solid, very flexible, and it slides and turns smoothly. I like that I can slide it away to do paperwork on the desk top and then pull it out again to go back on the computer. The wrist-rest is a bit narrow and firm, but it appears that it will last a long time. Installation was a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: It's a good keyboard for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's a good keyboard for the money. A little stiff to slide in and out, but decent quality and no problem to install. Will not accommodate an ergonomic keyboard without removing the hand rest and then you need to do something to keep the keyboard on it if it is tilted. I used small dowels in the holes used to attached the hand rest.
customer_reviews.author: Bob D

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go with an adjustable desk, and have had it for almost a year now. Easy installation, great quality, and good durability. Nearly infinitely adjustable, and it holds where you place it 5 days a week. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knee-Knocker
customer_reviews.text: There is a large plastic knob that is used to adjust the tilt of this tray. It is in a spot where I am constantly knocking my knee into. The handle is heavy duty molded plastic with hard edges, and cannot be removed. I'm either going to have to cut it off, wrap it in bubble wrap, or start wearing a knee pad on my right knee.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Keyboard Tray!
customer_reviews.text: I was glad that I read another review that recommended making a template to drill the holes. This is a very sturdy unit, but it’s heavy. It was a bit difficult to install myself, but I did it! Now my keyboard is at the correct height for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. I had to buy shorter screws to install the keyboard track for it to work with my desk. I wish the palm support was a softer material or foam. You can very slightly tilt the keyboard platform in the negative angle (the picture shows the positive angle).
customer_reviews.author: Potter

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to install as they say. The screws were so cheap that they didn’t fit together and I had to buy new ones. The arm and framing are built well but heavy is not a good thing when you need to move it around. I do like the angles it can achieve but I think there are other systems which may do the job better.
customer_reviews.author: Zahide Marenic

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: I recommend taking off the wrist rest to give yourself more room for your keyboard. This product is a great way to keep your cost down if you don't expect to change its position frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Stein

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this. My table wasn't that thick, good thing I had extra screws to use. Seems nice to use, I can adjust to proper height and angle, keyboard and mouse fits well. Will update in the future for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect smooth movement
customer_reviews.text: The installation was pretty easy. It looks quality and feels sturdy, but it better be, because you have to beat it into submission to get it to slide in and out. The slide is sticky and difficult. The rotation of the tray is stiff, but you don't want it too loose that it moves when you don't want it to. But the slide........... better get a hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Greg C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality under desk keyboard drawer
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality over all. I did lube the track a bit. Just a little draggy when first installed but it frees up nicely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard tray.
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install. Easy to adjust to a comfortable position. Replaced a wooden pullout drawer in my desk. Quality of product is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Parmelee

customer_reviews.title: Not as smooth as you would like
customer_reviews.text: One screw to hold the board to the bracket was too shot. This uses nylon runners and really is a pain to pull in and out
customer_reviews.author: J. Singer

customer_reviews.title: Its good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: its really hard to move. You will need to add grease. If the table is not flat, you will not be able to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this Keyboard tray. I needed to get one to reduce my inflammation from Tennis Elbow. THis is sturdy and an excellent keyboard tray. Easy to install and adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: SAKANOA

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness for a handy hubby!
customer_reviews.text: Took away a star because the product install directions stink, and does not come with enough screws to complete installation. That being said, it's a great, sturdy keyboard tray. Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Helen W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: essential functions got it right! Strong support mechanism and simple and good keyboard tray (perfect size).
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very comfort adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Love this keyboard tray. Installs easy. Works wonderfully. My wtirst for not ache anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a nice tray but there's no hardware to attach ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice tray but there's no hardware to attach the tray to the arm. The screws to attach the arm to the desk are very long and if used would come through the top of my desk. The directions are dismal. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J Pakenen

customer_reviews.title: Great Item!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two as they have been installed in a long, floating desk that is in our home office. They arrived on time and well packed. Once installed, we find that they operate as expected - able to tilt and roll with ease.
customer_reviews.author: GarRox Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Slide-Out Tray
customer_reviews.text: I've had this slide-out keyboard tray for over a year. I use it everyday and it is still as sturdy as ever.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Black

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I used to be in corporate facilities installing keyboard trays for all of the offices and cubicles. Although this isn't the top of the line product, like Human Scale, for the price and what you get, I highly recommend this product for home use. Install was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Cyber Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a professional grade keyboard tray. I use it in my office. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Franco Facchini

customer_reviews.title: Great, I own 3
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorites. Every time I need a Keyboard tray, I buy this one, it has enough room to hold an apple numeric keyboard and a trackpad 2 side by side and it is extremely sturdy and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mack W.

customer_reviews.title: Great computer mount
customer_reviews.text: Not too hard to install, lots of flexibility in positioning. Super solid. I've been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Maser

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This thing came with 12 screws! Super sturdy. Great design. Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Bugarsky

customer_reviews.title: Highly comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, very sturdy. The adjustability enables you to set it exactly where you want height wise. Also like the fact you can push it under the desk top completely out of the way, when you want to.
customer_reviews.author: jtech

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Sturdy. I’m very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for back problems
customer_reviews.text: Husband has back problems and needs to stand periodically while he works on the computer. This stand is perfect for our home office. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Flexible and easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mound and very solid. Wish a little wider for a full size keyboard with a key pad but still very flexible and readjusts easily.
customer_reviews.author: daduke

customer_reviews.title: and working out great.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to install it in 12 minutes. No issues, and working out great.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Once it's Installed
customer_reviews.text: Once you have it installed it works great, but it really is hard to install unless you can turn you table upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer III

customer_reviews.title: Gel is not Gel or “Plush”
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be fooled like I was by the video. The gel is like hard plastic instead. If your looking to protect your wrist... don’t get this one. FALSE ADVERTISING! Your definition of plush and mine is extremely off. The rest of the keyboard tray is ok, it’s for sure wabbly but easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: DENA

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just got it installed, and it is working just as it should. We researched a lot and this one look like the best, and I think we made a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid tray but lacks good installation instructions
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy tray that adjusts and can be pushed/swung under your desk easily. I have more than enough room for my keyboard and mouse on this tray. I have to agree with alot of others about installation instructions being slim to none. It is only a picture so if you have no mechanical intellect at all, and by that I mean looking at the pieces and figuring it out yourself, you will experience some frustration installing this.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: The product was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to install. I like the size of the tray - it accommodates keyboard and mouse under the table top. Height easily adjusts and keeps its position. And, it was a great price. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Customers are pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one I have purchased and installed. Customers are pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest R.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It is sturdy it beats anything I ever purchased before especially the ones at Staples.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid design and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: The employee that I installed this for is picky and happy with this after 6 months. That’s good in my book
customer_reviews.author: jnk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard tray that's sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard tray is sturdy and easy to install. It is almost as good quality as commercial ones I have used in offices. The price also makes this a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Nice with no instructions
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty item but if you're not good at figuring things out then do not order this item. It comes with NO instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jamal's wife

customer_reviews.title: Great tray for mmy tricky desk!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on time. Easy to install. Solid feel, very versatile adjustment settings.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble (for girls with power tools). Great angles and so comfortable compared to the tray I had on my old desk. Love the flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Julia A. Roehrich

customer_reviews.title: This was extremely easy to install since my desk could be flipped over
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely easy to install since my desk could be flipped over. We are especially happy since we have both right- and left-mousers in the family. Good quality. Good purchase for my family.
customer_reviews.author: DK from TX

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard and mouse tray is solidly built and nicely adjustable. It provides a good, stable platform for my keyboard and mouse. Easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Pick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is sturdy and adjustable. It fits my ergonomic logitech keyboard and mouse with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Anoxa Corp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to install. Big enough surface for a large key board and mouse. Very sturdy, easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: AumTatSat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and you can also raise it which is an added plus!
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard tray and great value
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard tray and great value! I initially bought a different one but returned due to lack of quality. This is sturdy and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Built my own desk to work from home. This was the perfect addition. Easy to install/adjust. Love the built in soft wrist wrest and plenty of room for the mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It.
customer_reviews.text: I just had shoulder surgery and I need a way to type pain-free while I recover. This Is exactly what I needed. It is easy to install and very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Found AFTER installation that the keyboard platform is warped so ...
customer_reviews.text: Found AFTER installation that the keyboard platform is warped so the keyboard wobbles. Palm rest has big scrape or imperfection. Both pictured.
customer_reviews.author: asilmusic

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and easy to mount.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the space I needed, easy to mount and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Waite

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The directions were pretty worthless. Luckily it's not a very complex install. Build is fairly good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Saltzman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These were a little pricier than others but clearly well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very good. They don't stay at the angle you position ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very good. They don't stay at the angle you position them at. Microsoft Sculpt Ergonomic Keyboard for Business (5KV-00001 ) trays are much better, even though they're plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good and sturdy. Easy enough to mount and use. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Stan M

customer_reviews.title: I think it's very well made. Solid material. ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it's very well made. Solid material. Mine didn't come with two rubber bumpers mentioned on the install sheet, but the end caps suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Ama zon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He's started building Big Wheels at 19 years old and he's just progressed nicely! This had him running to his computer to ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband builds things and usually has no problem. He's started building Big Wheels at 19 years old and he's just progressed nicely! This had him running to his computer to research video's and prior installation reviews twice. I'm not disappointed in the end result because it does work and fit. I'm enclosing a picture of the 'instructions'. You prolly can't tell from pic but there are 12 holes in the bracket and 10 screws and no notes on it. I don't understand why they couldn't make an instruction sheet that actually had instructions as well as a parts list.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Okay keyboard tray for the price
customer_reviews.text: Okay keyboard tray for the price. The tray doesn’t move so smoothly, but it’s decent.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good. Son had some difficulty installing
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. Son had some difficulty installing, but it helps a lot with arm pain. A little jerky in the slide mechanism, but t is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: The cool product was missing a small rubber stopwatch, after all, I recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Mariusz

customer_reviews.title: but it was nice!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to send it back because it was too big for my desk. but it was nice!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Johanson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase I'm very pleased with the stability
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase I'm very pleased with the stability, I feel this will hold up over time. I checked out several of our local office supply stores and most keyboard stands were made of plastic, this is made with a heavy material plenty wide enough and tilts as well. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: The platform is well made and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The platform is well made and easy to assemble. It adjusts well for my situation and the open format of the platform allows me the freedom to move my mouse and keyboard where it is most comfortable. I received it earlier than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Enforcer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it didn't have the black leather piece in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish it didn't have the black leather piece in the front. it interferes with the range of space that the mouse require.
customer_reviews.author: Renee K. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Fancy, but large...
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice, but much larger than I expected, even with the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: TrayandJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my new desk area in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Szopinski

customer_reviews.title: Wished it fit my work and home desks!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an ergonomic keyboard tray for my workstation and ordered the VIVI after much research. Unfortunately, the mounting bracket is too long for the available space at my desk, so I had to return it. I will say that it is solidly built and would have been just what I needed. To make it worse, it also didn't work with the configuration of the underside of my home office desk. :(
customer_reviews.author: Steve P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tray for the money - very sturdy. Easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: TegAg96

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Very sturdy. Slides and adjusts very smoothly. Glad I picked this one.

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. Love the larger surface area! It's sturdy so I don't have any qualms about putting pressure on it while working.

customer_reviews.text: a little bit shaky where the track meets the arm, not a real tight fit. Overall, suits my needs.

product_meta.title: VIVO Adjustable Computer Keyboard and Mouse Platform Tray, Ergonomic Under Table Desk Mount Drawer (MOUNT-KB01)
feature_bullets: ERGONOMIC keyboard and mouse tray that attaches to the underside of your desk. The keyboard slides forwards and back on an 18” track (Be sure to measure the under side of your desk to make sure the 18" track will fit!)
ENHANCES typing posture and reduces wrist soreness with removable plush padding, a tilting mechanism, 360 swivel, and 5" of height adjustment
DELUXE UNIVERSAL 25" x 10" tray weighing 13.75 lbs fits most keyboards and mice allowing user their choice of both
SIMPLE ASSEMBLY process with all hardware necessary for mounting your tray provided
3 YEAR MANUFACTURER WARRANTY - This keyboard tray is backed with a limited 3-year Manufacturer warranty as well as friendly tech support to help with any questions or concerns
